sentence.Network_en: She placed a towel on a cluster of rocks just clear of the tidemark.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把一条毛巾放在刚没过涨潮线的一堆石头上。

sentence.Network_en: He has reached the tidemark of his prosperity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已到达了他成功的高潮.
